attributes.review: In my opinion trump should not even have a app made for him...he doesn't deserve this, what he deserves is to not exist in this world, all he's doing is ruining the world and now he's trying to delete tiktok...we had enough, all we want is to delete this app and the racist trump😁

attributes.review: This is the worst app I’ve ever had. When I opened it, it played ratchet music and my ears started to bleed. My cat puked on the floor and my mom fell down the stairs😪. I’d rather hangout with ice age baby all day. Don’t download this app❤️🤩
attributes.title: Disgusting
